00025 
00026 class ScopeGuardImplBase {
00027 protected:
00028   ~ScopeGuardImplBase() { }
00029   ScopeGuardImplBase(const ScopeGuardImplBase& other) throw()
00030     : m_dismissed(other.m_dismissed) {
00031     other.dismiss();
00032   }
00033 
00034   template <typename GuardT>
00035   static void safe_run(GuardT& guard) throw() {
00036     if (!guard.m_dismissed) try {
00037       guard.run();
00038     }
00039     catch(...) { }
00040   }
00041 
00042 public:
00043   ScopeGuardImplBase() throw() : m_dismissed(false) { }
00044   void dismiss() const throw() { m_dismissed = true; }
00045 
00046 private:
00047   ScopeGuardImplBase& operator=(const ScopeGuardImplBase&); // not assignable
00048 
00049   mutable bool m_dismissed;
00050 };
00051 
00058 typedef const ScopeGuardImplBase& ScopeGuard;
00059 
00063 template <typename FunT>
00064 class ScopeGuardImpl0 : public ScopeGuardImplBase {
00065 public:
00066   static ScopeGuardImpl0<FunT> make_guard(FunT fun) {
00067     return ScopeGuardImpl0<FunT>(fun);
00068   }
00069   ~ScopeGuardImpl0() throw() { safe_run(*this); }
00070   void run() { m_fun(); }
00071 
00072 private:
00073   ScopeGuardImpl0(FunT fun) : m_fun(fun) { }
00074 
00075   FunT m_fun;
00076 };
00077 
00078 template <typename FunT>
00079 inline ScopeGuardImpl0<FunT> make_guard(FunT fun) {
00080   return ScopeGuardImpl0<FunT>::make_guard(fun);
00081 }

00086 template <typename FunT, typename P1T>
00087 class ScopeGuardImpl1 : public ScopeGuardImplBase {
00088 public:
00089   static ScopeGuardImpl1<FunT, P1T> make_guard(FunT fun, P1T p1) {
00090     return ScopeGuardImpl1<FunT, P1T>(fun, p1);
00091   }
00092   ~ScopeGuardImpl1() throw() { safe_run(*this); }
00093 
00094   void run() { m_fun(m_p1); }
00095 
00096 private:
00097   ScopeGuardImpl1(FunT fun, P1T p1) : m_fun(fun), m_p1(p1) { }
00098 
00099   FunT m_fun;
00100   const P1T m_p1;
00101 };

00105   return ScopeGuardImpl1<FunT, P1T>::make_guard(fun, p1);
00106 }

00112 class ScopeGuardImpl2: public ScopeGuardImplBase {

00116   }

00167 template <class ObjT, typename MethodT>
00168 class ObjScopeGuardImpl0 : public ScopeGuardImplBase {
00169 public:
00170   static ObjScopeGuardImpl0<ObjT, MethodT>
00171   make_obj_guard(ObjT &obj, MethodT method) {
00172     return ObjScopeGuardImpl0<ObjT, MethodT>(obj, method);
00173   }
00174   ~ObjScopeGuardImpl0() throw() { safe_run(*this); }
00175 
00176   void run() { (m_obj.*m_method)(); }
00177 
00178 private:
00179   ObjScopeGuardImpl0(ObjT &obj, MethodT method)
00180     : m_obj(obj), m_method(method) { }
00181 
00182   ObjT &m_obj;
00183   MethodT m_method;
00184 };
00185

00187 inline ObjScopeGuardImpl0<ObjT, MethodT>
00188 make_obj_guard(ObjT &obj, MethodT method) {
00189   return ObjScopeGuardImpl0<ObjT, MethodT>::make_obj_guard(obj, method);
00190 }

00195 template <class ObjT, typename MethodT, typename P1T>
00196 class ObjScopeGuardImpl1 : public ScopeGuardImplBase {
00197 public:
00198   static ObjScopeGuardImpl1<ObjT, MethodT, P1T>
00199   make_obj_guard(ObjT &obj, MethodT method, P1T p1) {
00200     return ObjScopeGuardImpl1<ObjT, MethodT, P1T>(obj, method, p1);
00201   }
00202   ~ObjScopeGuardImpl1() throw() { safe_run(*this); }
00203

00205

00264 template <class T>
00265 class RefHolder {
00266 public:
00267   RefHolder(T& ref) : m_ref(ref) {}
00268   operator T& () const { return m_ref; }
00269 
00270 private:
00271   RefHolder& operator=(const RefHolder&); // not assignable
00272   T& m_ref;
00273 };
00274 
00275 template <class T>
00276 inline RefHolder<T> by_ref(T& t) {
00277   return RefHolder<T>(t);
00278 }

00284 // The two level macros are needed for var<lineno>.
00285 // Otherwise, it'd be literally var__LINE__
00286 #define HT_CONCAT_(s1, s2) s1##s2
00287 #define HT_CONCAT(s1, s2) HT_CONCAT_(s1, s2)
00288 #define HT_AUTO_VAR(var) HT_CONCAT(var, __LINE__)
00289 
00290 #define HT_ON_SCOPE_EXIT(...) \
00291   ScopeGuard HT_AUTO_VAR(guard) = make_guard(__VA_ARGS__); \
00292   HT_UNUSED(HT_AUTO_VAR(guard))
00293 
00294 #define HT_ON_OBJ_SCOPE_EXIT(...) \
00295     ScopeGuard HT_AUTO_VAR(guard) = make_obj_guard(__VA_ARGS__); \
00296     HT_UNUSED(HT_AUTO_VAR(guard))
00297
